1b-97a5 chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po sarba d+harma mahA san ti bo de tsi ta ku la ya rA dza byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po// lta ba namkha' ltar mtha' dbus med pa'i rgyud//namkha'i snying po mchogi don// gsang ba mchogi mdo lung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal seng ge mgon po dang/ bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// 1 byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ /gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang poMW2PD19896ka1I2PD200151

97a5-103b5 chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems su 'dus pa'i mdo sarba d+harmA a ti mahA/ bo dhi tsi ta su tra de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs chen de dag tham.d// ston pa kun tu bzang po'i spyan sngar// rab tu shin tu mdun pa'i sgo nas 'khod de// tham.d mgrin gcig pa'i sgo nas zhus pa// ston pa kun tu bzang pos ni// chos rnams kun tu snang bar mdzad// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' des// don de rtsa ba gcig tu bstan// rtsa ba gcig gi don bstan pa// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba rtogs// zhes zhuso// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des// chos thams cad rtsa ba gcig pa'i mdo dang// 'grel pa 'digsungso// chos kun rtsa ba gcig pa 'di lta ste// chos nyid sems nyid gcig tu bstan pa la// grangs dang rnam pa yongs kyis bgrang du med// ma bcos rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// ti bya namkha'i lam la mkhas pa bzhin// mi rtog namkha' lta bur gnas par bya// rgyu rkyen ma byung rkyen med ma skyes pa'i// thams cad 'byung ba'i snying po byang chub la// yod pa'i sgros dang med pa'i skur pa dang// yin min sgro skur btags pa ga la yod// ces gsungso// ces byang chub kyi sems kyi mdo dang 'grel pa rdzogso 1 byang chub kyi sems kyi 'grel ba// rdzogs pa chen po'i mdo bcu las// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang poMW2PD19896ka1I2PD200151
98b3 2 rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi mdo las/ /rgyu 'bras gcig pa'i le'u ste gnyis paMW2PD19896ka1I2PD200151

398 Gtn001.014 MW2PD19896ka1I2PD200151
150b3-159b4 la zlo gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud
byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos// blo thag gcad cing bstan pa gtad pa 'di gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po da nyon cig/ chos nyid byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin spros pa ni// byang chub sems ni blo yis bsams pa men// bsams shing brtags pa'i chos ni rigs byed ye shes yin// rang byung ye shes rang shar de la med pa na// blo yis bsams shing bsgoms pa'i chos la re ma 'jog/ chos rnams kun gyi thag ni byang chub semsu gcad// ma bltas ma bsgoms bsams pa med pas thag chod na// de la rang byung ye shes shar bas /thag der gcad// chos sku d+migsumed par sems dpas blo thag chod// 'dod yon longs sku yin par sems dpas blo thag chod// phan sems sprul sku yin par sems dpas blo thag chod// snang ba rang sems yin par sems dpas blo thag chod// sems la gnyisu med pas bag chags sbyang du med// yul med rang gsal yin par sems dpas blo thag chod// thig le nyag gcig sems kyi rang bzhin yin mod kyang// nyag gcig cir yang 'byung bas spong dang sgrub ma byed// kun kyang yon tan mnyam pas sems dpas blo thag chod// da ltar snang ba'i rgyu lus 'di kun sems dpas ji ltar dgongs// 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul tsam du sems dpas dgongs mdzod la// sems ni bla med namkha' lta bu blo thag chod// kye sems dpa' chen po da dgongs shig/ rtsa rgyud le'u lnga bcu rtsa bdun gsungs pa yang// rang byung ye shes tshig tu bstan pa'i mdo lung yin// sems las rang byung ye shes gcig tu la zlos cig/ phyi ma le'u bcu dang gnyisu gsungs pa yang// rang byung ye shes bsams pas btags pa yin// da yang rang byung gcig tu sems dpas la zlos gcig/ phyi ma'i phyi ma le'u bcu dang lnga ru gsungs pa yang// rang byung ye shes rnal 'byor 'jog pa yin// sems dpa' rang byung ye shes gcig tu la zlos cig/ thos pas ston pa'i lde mig dang// bsam pas grol ba'i lde mig dang// bsgoms pas 'byin pa'i lde mig gis// nges par gtan la phab pa na// sems dpas legs par thag chod cig/ sems dpa' chen po da dgongs cig/ la zlos gsang ba'i 'khor lo 'khor ba'i srog gcod 'di/ sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la 'di gtado// blo ldan skal ba can la 'di gsungs 165a6-172b2 chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor brtsad nas gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa rnyogs pa med pa'i rgyud sarba d+harmaH mahA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mU la tshe d+ha sa muN+Da sa man+ta na bi la tan+t+ra de nas bcom ldan 'di skad gsungs// e ma ho// sangs rgyas tham.d kyi// chos kyi dbyings ni yi ge med// rang bzhin 'od gsal yongsu dag/ namkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med// bdud rtsi dri med rgyu ldan mtsho// namkha' la nyi shar 'od zer lnga/ dbus na namkha' bzhi yi mthong// gting ni rin chen bcud gsum gter// bde gshegs mi mchod rang sems mchod// rang sems sangs rgyas yin pa las// sangs rgyas gzhan du mi btsal te// rig pa rang grol bya btsal bral// rang snang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'di// dper na rmi lam lta bu ste// rmi lam bde sdug sna tshogs yang// gnyid sad dus na chos kyi sku// tshangs pa khyab 'jug la sogs bsgom// log pa'i lam du zhugs pa'o// namkha' lta bur sems 'gag pa// nyi tshe ba yi stong par lhung// mi gtsang keng rus la sogs bsgom// phyi yi sgrib pa can dang mtshungs// 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug sgom byed pa// skye mched bzhi las thar lam med// phung po gtan tshigs gzhigs nas bsgom// de ka rtog par shes par gyis// lha dang dkyil 'khor zhal phyag bsgom// med par sgro yis /btags pa yin// rtsa rlung thig ler bde ba 'dzin// ro myags mngal gyi srin bu mtshungs// skad cig snang srid lha ru gsal// 'di ni rtsol ba'i nad du 'gyur// zhi gnas 'thibs po bsgoms byed pa// ma he glang dang khyad par med// gsal ba phyi nang med par sems// rnam rig pas kyang shin tu gsog/ kun yin gang ma yin sogs pa// a tir khas 'che mu stegs chos// rdzogs chen ris med bya btsal bral// rgya chad phyogs lhung med pa'i phyir// re shig rdzogs chen rol par mtshon// sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la gtad// sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste// slob dpon snying ston gdams ngag thob// mtshams med gsum gyi rdzogs sangs rgyas// pha ma bsad pa'i 'bras bu gter// lta bas d+myal ba shin tu che// snang ba thams cad rdzun la ma khyer// ci spyod mo sham bu bzhin spyod// 'khor ba'i chos la chags pa skyed// bya lam khamsu gcig tu gdod// 'gro drug magtoD sem.n gnyis// sprul sku d+myal ba'i gnasu 'gro/ gangga''i chu dang se na'i mtsho// khyod kyi rtag tu bsres la 'thung// yum gyi bha ga rtag tu ltos// btsun mo des kyang me long ston// ldem po dgongs pa ma go bar// sgra bzhin spyad na log pa'i lam// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpa' bo ce// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung dang// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho 'di las byung// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// rba rlabs med pa'i mnyam nyid mtsho// rnyog ma med pa'i dri med chu// gdod nas dag pa'i bdud rtsi 'dis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i dri ma khrus// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// chedu ston pa 'di brjodo// kun rig thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// zab mo bdud rtsi lta bu'i chos// chos nyid byin rlabs rol pa yis// rnyogs med rgya mtsho'i klong ston pa// mnyam nyid rgya mtsho lta bu yis// kun tu bzang po mngon par bstod// chos tham.d rgya mtsho mtha' dang mnyam pa rnyog ma med pa'i rgyud las// bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal pos gsungs pa rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi khan po shrI sid+ha dang// bod kyi lo ts+tsha bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

269b5-283b7 rgyud kyi rgyal po gser gyi rus sbal rdo rje theg pa rtsa ba'i rgyud tan tra rA dza swa na ha sa da badzra da ri ha bi tan tra rgyud gyi rgyal po gser gyi rus sbal rdo rje theg pa rtsa ba'i rgyud// rgyud gyi ma mo// sems phyogs kyi phyi mo// lta ba thams cad kyi phugs dgongs pa'i gdeng rdzogso// //sa ma ya so phag shi kha thams// nor 'dod bu pho dge slong bdag 'dra yis// rin chen sna lnga'i snying po gser khyer nas// rin chen srog la ma 'dzems dka' ba'i la rnams bsgal// nges pa'i snying po byang sems rgyud mad rtsa gnyis btsal// 'jam dpal bshes gnyen bla ma dang// bdag 'dra bai ro tsa na yis// sgra skad bstun te chan la phab nas kyang// bod kyi yul du rmongs pa tshan gsum byung ba cha mchis nas// 'dir drangs mnga' bdag rgyal po nyid kyi phyag tu phul// rmongs pa tshan gsum dus na dar bar shog/ dang po bai ro tsa nas bsgyur// de nas lho brag nas khyung grags kyis gter nas gton pa'o 1 zhes ston pa nyid sku che ba'i yon tan dang ldan nas// thugs rjes phyi rabs kyi don du bstan pa/ gleng gzhi'i le'u dang poMW2PD19896ka1I2PD200151

279b3-291b4 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa/ gsang sngags chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba many+dzu shrI b+hud tra sa ma ti ma hA gu ya man+t+ra tan+t+ra nA ma de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par zung// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang gsum// dgongs pa ma nor de bzhino// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje yang// yul med 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// spyir na zhing khams gsum na yang// sku gsum rgyal ba'i zhing khams yin// chosku'i zhing khams rnam dag stug po bkod pa'i sa// longsku'i zhing khams mtshan rdzogs rdo rje 'chang gis/ /sprul sku'i zhing khams khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu/ /gdul bya gsum yang de bzhin te/ /nyid las mi zhen sku lnga dang/ /sem.da' sems ma'i sa dang ni/ /rigs drug du ma snang ba'o/ /de dag la yang gnyis yin te/ /sprul pa sku dang rang rgyud pa/ /rang rgyud 'khrul zhing 'khor ba ste/ /yan lag bcuis srid rtsa ston/ /rten 'brel 'khor lo bcuis 'chang/ /snang ba chen po gsal ba che/ /nor bu chen po rin chen tog /'od chen rnam.r snang bar byed/ /ye shes sku ste rang byung ba/ /sem.n kun gyi yid ltar 'gyogs/ /sna tshogs gzugs can yid la skyes/ /gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun tu ston/ /de ltar 'khrul snang shar ba'o/ /de ni sprul sku'i zhing khams yin/ /chos sku'i zhing khams thugs kyi le'u bzhin/ /longs sku'i zhing khams sku'i le'u bzhin/ /thugs rdo rje dag pa'i byung tshul yang/ / sku yi 'od dang gsung gi 'od zer las byung/ /rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che/ /rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od/ /sku gsum dri med thugs rje 'byung/ /chosku'i gnas lugs gong bzhin bstan/ /thugs rje rgyal ba'i rig pa ste/ /gong bshad bzhin du shes par bgyis//longsku'i thugs rjes sprul sku ste/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku sku yi rgyal/ /mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug /yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra/ /sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog /sangyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba/ /phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed//ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don bgyid pa/ /lha'i dbang po lha'i lha/ /lha'i bdag po lha min bdag /'chi med dbang po lha yi lha/ /'jom byed 'jom byed dbang phyag po/ /rdo rje sem.da' / sem.da' che/ /ston pa gcig po 'gro ba'i bla/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang/ /'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa/ /chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po/ /byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste/ /snying rje yi ni ya la dgod/ /sangyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa/ /dpaldan sangyas pad+ma skyes/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje dkyil dkrungs rdzogsangyas/ /shes rab chen po skad cig la/ /chos kun khong du chud pa po/ /chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste/ /rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal/ /rdo rje blo gros don chen byed/ /kun tu bzang po'i gtso bo ste/ /'gro kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs/ /nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo gsel/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa tho/ /rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod/ /chos kyi ghande sgra bo che/ /phyogs bcur chos kyi rnga bo che/ /chos kyi dung de sgra chen ldan/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs/ /'gro na gdugs cing yangs pa ste/ /byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can/ /sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste/ /gzugsu 'byin spangs shing/ /sems can kun yid yid dan ldan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rig pa/ /sem.n kun gyi yid la gnas/ /de dag sems dang mthun par 'jug /sem.n kun yid tshim par byed/ /mya ngan 'das pa mya ngan 'das/ /legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye/ /bde sdug gsel ba'i mthar gyur pa/ /chags bra lus las 'das pa po/ /lus can kun las rnam.r grol/ /zhes gsungso// de nas lag na rdo rje sna drangs nas/ /bskor ba 1 Gtn006.017 MW2PD19896cha6I2PD200191
184b1-294b4 spros bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba ti la ka du ha ka la tra du // ti la ka du ha ka la/ tan+t+ra mahA nA ma tantra ra' dza ma ha'/ sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor don gsal chen po'i rgyud mthong bas grol ba 'di// yongsu rdzogso// //slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi sgra rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //guhya/ gtad rgya rgya rgya/ ethi/ yang gsang ba'i man ngag gi rgyud chen po 'di sdud pa'i 'khor dga' rab rdo rjes sdus nas tshig dang yi ger bkod nas/ gu ru 'jam dpal bshes /gnyen la bshad// des gu ru shri sring ha la bshad des oyan gu ru pad+ma la bshad// oyan pad+ma 'byung gnas ngas/ snga brgya dus kyi snyig ma la/ ldan gsum skyes bu'i don ched du// chos rnams kun gyi ma chen mo// kun bskyed rang bzhung tshugs shing tshogs// spros bral don gsal rgyud chen sbas// sems can sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor don// thos bsam sgom la mi ltos shing// bstan pas rtogs shing dran pas gsal/ /'phrad pas dbang thob mthong bas grol// 'bras bu da ltar thob pa'i chos// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yin// thugs gter yang gter gsang mdzod 'dis// ma tshang kha skong brul mtsho sdud// 'phrad thogs nyamsublangs mchog ma// snying nor yin no mig 'bras yin// bdag kyang thos chung ma yin te/ /rdo rje 'chang dang mkhyen rab mnyam// de phyir thugs kyi gsang gter 'di// gnam sa'i bar na gter cig ma'o// las 'phro can dang 'phrad nas kyang// bco lnga'i lo bar yid la brnag/ gsang dam dam bsrung dus thal tshe// 'khor ba blos btang des don 'tshol// bla ma la gus srog 'dor phod// gsum la dpe bstod kun la min// dus la babs nas 'gro don yang// snyan rgyud du thob nas skal ldan skyong// rgyud mchog bla med nub dgongs nas// rgyud 'di gter kha gsum du sbas// gcig ni byang gter pra dun tser// rnam snang thugs khar sbas te bzhag/ stag gi lo la 'byin par 'gyur// gcig ni yang gter 'dir sbas te// sbrul gyi lo la 'byin par 'gyur// gcig ni mkha' ri dgye ri phug// spre'u'i lo la 'byin par 'gyur// de yang 'dir ni ma bu tshang// yang gter rgyud gsum bu yi tshul// ci phyir ma'i bcud bsdud pa'o// don gsal rgyud mchog ma'i tshul// ci kun bskyed rang gzhung tshugs// de ltar zab phyir thugs gter yang// yang gter themsu 'di ma stan// de ltar sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor don// 'dis ston phyir na rgyud sor zhog// 'bres pa'i mon pes g.yog sa re// tig ka'i sbar mos bsdams sa re// lung drangs lto tshim bskus sa re/ /de phyir bka' rgyud rang sar zhog/ /don 'grol dka' na bla ma brten// tshogs brgya rtsa dang maN+Dala dbul// zhib tu dpe blta don la spyod// bltas pas grol ba kho na'o// shes rab blo ldan snying rtse can dang 'phrad par shog// //ci phyir gsang sngags ngo bo shes rab yin/ ithi / guhya/ rgya rgya rgya 1 253b6-296a3 dam tshig tham.d kyi nyams chag skong ba'i lung lnga/ bshags pa tham.d kyi rgyud dri ma /med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba sa ma ya sarba bi ti a nu sarba sa ni tan+t+ra bi mA la rA dza nA ma nyams chags tham.d skong ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bshags pa tham.d kyi rgyud dri ma med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma' la mi tra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa' ba gnyags dz+nyA na ku ma ras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // bla med ye shes dkyil 'khor gang ba'i zla// tshems phreng 'od dkar 'dzum pa'i zhal sgo las// chos phung ganga''i klung rdul grangs kyis kyang// gzhan min 'gro kun bsam yas 'tshol ba bzhin/ /dbang por 'tsham gsung sman gyi sgrib gnyid nad// cha shas tsam mthar byas te gzhil nus rung// bya rog khyu mchog 'gros kyi khyad par ltar/ /yo ga'i lam gyis chod gcig tu myur// theg dgu'i nang tshan rnal 'byor chen po yi/ /rab 'bog glang po'i tantra las phyungs pa/ /sdig tshogs dri ma med par rtsa ba nas/ /'byin byed bshags pa'i rgyud rgyal 'di rmad byung/ /'gro khams nyon mongs rdul gyi dam tshig klung/ /ma dag rnyog mar gyur pa las sgrungs pa'i/ /gsang chen chos kyi nor bu ke ta ka / lus chen bsod nams zong gis nyos pa bzhin/ /'jig rten mig cig rnams kyi 'khrul med du/ /'phags yul skad las bod dper rab bsgyur cing/ /blun rmongs yi ge'i lhad kyis som nyi'i tshogs/ /glegs bam du mar gtugs te zhi ba mor spyad/ /tha snyad rtog ge'i glang pas gangs kyi ri/ /sngon mthing mig can la 'jug rdzas min yang/ /skal ldan rab rib sel ba'i gser thur gyis/ /phra rags chos kun gsal ba'i rtsa sman ljon// mi shes nongs pa tshangs pa'i 'khor lo yis// khas blangs dam bca'i mgrin pa nyer bcad kyang/ /thar pa'i srog rtsa mi chad 'chi med kyi/ /bdud rtsi'i ltung ba 'di las gzhan na gang// chos spong sgrib pa'i khung bur rtag nyal nas/ /ngan spyod dug lce skyong ba'i mkhas rlom sprul// snying la gnag dka'i ri dwags lte ba'i dri/ /gcil la dus gsum rgyal ba sras bcas ngal/ /'on te gsang las ches gsang 'brug gi sgra/ /thos pa'i mod la rten bde'i mngal gyi khur// sbrul nus rig 'dzin rma bya'i bu mo rnams// dga' ba'i sgro gshog zlum por nga sgyur cig/ bsod nams 'bras bu mtho ris chu bo yi// 'gro rgyud sgrib gnyis khyab 'jug rkang pa'i dri// rab bkrus kun bzang go 'phang rgyal mtshan gyi/ /rtse mor mdzes pa'i tog 'od 'bar bar shog /ye dag rang rig nyi ma'i snying po la// skyon gyis ma gos gdod ma'i sangs rgyas zhal// gzhan nas 'tshol min mngon sum 'jal nus pa'i/ /bkra shis 'jig rten ma lus khyab par shog/ dri med bshags rgyud 'di nges gsang theg pa chen po'i lam du zhugs pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs la med du mi rung bar mchis pa yig mkhan sna tshogs pa'i skyon gyis mthun mi mthun ci rigs snang ba glegs bam 'ga' zhig la nye bar btugs te shin /tu dag pa'i lugs su bgyis nas me 'brug dga' ldan phun tshogs gling du brkos pa'i tshe par byang smon lam dang bcas pa za hor gyi sngags smyon gang shar rang grol gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rigs pa 'dzin pa 'jam dbyangs grags pas bgyis pa sarba di kka'l yud ya bha wantu// // dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud rdzogs so //sarba manga'lam. 1 MW2PD19896dza19I2PD200311

te/ /rtogs pa phul lo/ /stong gsum ye shes dkyil 'khor du/ /dur khrod chen po byang chub lung/ /rtogs chen mnyam sbyor thugs kyi mdzod/ /bshad pas nyams pa'i snying po 'di/ /sangs rgyas gzhan nas spyan mi 'dren/ /nyid las kun rdzogs gzhal yas khang/ /dngos grub gzhan du mi slong ste/ /grub pa'i dkyil 'khor rang la shar/ /re dgos med pa ye nas gnas/ /gzhan nas mi slong nyid la rdzogs/ /mnyam nyid ma skyes mya ngan 'das zhes brjod do/ /shin tu dam zhing ngo tshar skyes nas ston pa la sna dbang lhag nas nyan to/ /de nas yang mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal po'i/ /gnod 'dul lha la sogs pa rnams la bka' stsal ba/ /gnod 'dul lha la sogs pa khyed rnams la ngas chos 'di bsdud la bshad do// dpal he ru ka'i gal po 'di ni// rgya che zhing don zab pa yin te// khyod kyis zin par gyis shig/ rtogs shig ma dang 'dra ste/ /thugs rjes la 'bri bskol med do/ /de bzhin du sems can gyi rnam par shes pa yang de yang 'dra bar 'bri bskom med do/ /de yang mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal pos/ /lha gnod 'dul la sogs pa la bstsal pa/ /stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul rnyed la/ /lus zhing gi rdul rnyed du phul ba bas ni/ /tan tra chen po 'di'i don rtogs pa bsod nams che'o/ /dus gsum gyi sangs 1b1-28a4 bdud rtsi rin po che ye shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud ces bya ba nA ma a mri ta rat+na gu h+ya dz+nyA na tsak+k+ra tan+t+ra de nas ston pa dpal kun tu bzang po des/ 'khor dang yongs kyi rnal 'byor pa la gdams pa dang gtad pa 'di yongsu gsungs pa/ 'khor tham.d la yang bzhad pa'i 'dzum gyis ltas nas 'di skad ces gsungso// ngas bstan pa'i gsang ba'i bdud rtsi 'di// bdud kyi lding rnam pa gsum gyis sem.ntham.d lus rnams rnam par dben pa dang// ngag rnams rnam par dben pa dang/ sems rnamsrnam.r dben pa dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la sku lnga ye shes 'byung bar byos shig/ 'di la ma mos pa gang la la dag la/ brag phug kha byang du brten du ltas pa bzhin du thugs rje chen po 'byung bar mi 'gyuro// 'di la mi mos pa gang la la dag bdud rtsi bum pa gang yang mgo la reg pa'i gnas medo// 'di la ni mos pa gang la la dag la gsang ba'i don 'di nyid tshig tsam yang thos par mi 'gyuro// 'di la mi mos pa gang dag la la// bstan pa gang la gnas pa'i don rnal 'byor dangrjesu rnal 'byor dang/ shin tu rnal 'byor gyi don gang yang thos par mi 'gyuro// 'di la mi mos pa gang dag la la// tshe rabs gang du yang tha na mu stegs pa'i chos kyang thos par mi 'gyur yid la yang mi byede// mtha' khob rgyal po ngan pa'i rgyal khams kyi blon po'i tshul can du skye'o// 'di la nyan pa dang/ ston pa dang/ yid la byed pa dang/ 'dri ba dang/ 'chang ba dang/ snyan par smra ba dang/ nges pa'i don du byed pa dang/ bla mar byed pa dang/ bkur stir byed pa dang/ don gtan la 'bebs pa rnams ni sangs rgyas mthong ba yang yin/ chos gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa mthong ba yang yin// theg pa chen po'i dge 'dun dang/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor yid la byed pa la mthong ba yang yino// gzhan yang sa dang lam la mkhas pa yang 'di kho na'i yon tano// 'di la yid la byed pa rnams ni sangs rgyas yid la byed pa'o// chos yid la byed pa'o// dge 'dun yid la byed pa'o// de ltar yid la byed pa dag ni gsang ba dang/ gsang chen dang/ ye shes snying po'i don nyamsu blangs nas tshe 'di nyid las dang bden pa'i lam mthong/ gnyisu med pa'i sa thob/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyuro//gzhan yang ngas bstan pa'i chos phun sum tshogs pa 'di sem.n yongs la smin par gyis shig/ 'dis dbang bskur bar gyis shig/ 'dis dbugs phyin par gyis shig/ 'dis ma dad pa rnams dad par gyis shig/ 'di khyed rnams la yongsu gtado// bcang ba dang/ bstan pa dang/ sgrub pa dang/ bri ba dang/ bklag pa dang/ blta ba rnams legs par byos shig/ nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu// lho phyogs bhe ta'i yul shed du// byams ldan mgon po klu zhes 'byung// /de yi bstan pa dam pa bzung// bdud rtsi bcud kyi yang snying// rnam pa gsum las// bam po khri'i nang nas snying po'i rgyud rin po che ye shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i phyogs gsang chen thig le'i rgyud gtad nas ston pa nyid mi snang bar gyur to// 'khor rnams kyis kyang pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas mi smra bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon parbstodo// ye shes gsang ba 'khor lo'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma' la mi tra dang/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba zhang dz+nyA nas gtan la phab pa las/ phyis ska ba dpal brtsegs la sogs pas yongsu gtan la phab pa'o 1
